job.title: Site Reliability Engineer // NYC // Cloud
job.description: A global leader in analytics consulting and technology is looking for a Site Reliability Engineer to join their NYCbased team This fastgrowing company helps toptier clients through marketing optimization improved customer insights and datadriven decisioningltbrgtltbrgtAs an SRE you will be responsible for transforming the existing DevOps framework You will focus on automation CICD container orchestration infrastructure as code IaC and securityltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtRequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligtBachelors degree in Computer Science or equivalent work experience ltligt ltligtWorking experience in both AWD and Azure environments ltligt ltligtProficient scripting in Bash Python andor PowerShell ltligt ltligtUnderstanding of Docker ltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltstronggtltugtThe Offerltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligtCompetitive Salary Up to 145Kyear DOEltligt ltligt10 bonus ltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltstronggtltugtYou Will Receive The Following Benefitsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligtComprehensive health insurance ltligt ltligt401kltligt ltligtGenerous PTOltligt ltligtContinued trainingeducation programsltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltemgtApplicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a fulltime basis now and in the futureltbrgtltbrgtltemgtltstronggtPosted Byltstronggt Carolyn Regimballtbrgtltbrgt
